dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:13,000,000 (E 90째41'00"--E 97째55'00"/N 28째00'00"--N 15째00'00"). Relief shown pictorially. Shows roads, railroads, lighthouses, passes, forts, and administrative divisions. On verso: French text, entitled: Description de Bengala. Oriented with north to the left. Page number in upper right: 69. Likely from: Thresor De Chartes, Contenant Les Tableaux De Tous Les Pays Du Monde / Barent Langenes. Amsterdam: Christoffle Guyot, 1602.|9 x 13 centimeters|Scale 1:13,000,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
